title: All of my Firefox web pages are black.
content:
Hello!

I have researched this topic and can't seem to find a good solution. Here's the issue. Out of nowhere, all of my Firefox web pages went from white to black. I have tried adjusting settings, themes, add-ins, and they are still black.

Please let me know if you have a solution that can help!

Many thanks!!! SDJ
creator: medicalbillsjacobs
